availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel Green and Eliza Green. Day laborer in Washington County in 1860. Private in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from April 5, 1862 to November 1864. Killed by guerrillas in Washington County.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District 1, p. 144.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 34-35.
KYR-0002-225-0060.
